Address.label: Address
Address.value: 14 RIDGE SQUARE NW,SUITE 500, WASHINGTON, District of Columbia, 20016, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CAVA Group, Inc. owns and operates a chain of Mediterranean restaurants. The company offers salads, dips, spreads, toppings, and dressings. It sells its products through whole food markets and grocery stores. The company also provides online food ordering services. Cava Group, Inc. was founded in 2006 and is based in Washington, District of Columbia.
